TestCaseMetaData.name: Smoke test ACK to AppACK
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Century Hospital's LIS transmits an accept acknowledgement message to Dr Radon's EHR-S which indicates the Application Acknowledgement message has been successfully received.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Test case ACK_0.0_4.1-GU message has been received by the LIS.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Minimally populated message. Demonstrate capability to support creating a positive acknowledgment Message in response to successful receipt of the Application Acknowledgment ( ACK ) message: Minimally populated MSH Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSH segment. Minimally populated MSA Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSA segment.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the initial "smoke testing" to reveal simple failures of the acknowledgment message severe enough to preclude further testing.
